subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. approved a request from Orlando Sanchez after ruling previously that a few minutes he had played for his national team in 2010 had cost him a season.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. approved a request from Orlando Sanchez after ruling previously that a few minutes he had played for his national team in 2010 had cost him a season.
